front.title: Architecture and Deployment Considerations for Secure Origin BGP (soBGP)

abstract.t: There is a great deal of concern over the security of the Border Gateway Protocol, which is used to provide routing information to the Internet and other large internetworks. This draft provides an architecture for a secure distributed registry of routing information to address these concerns. The draft begins with an overview of the operation of this system, and then follows with various deployment scenerios, starting with what we believe will be the most common deployment option.
